source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_SEQ_00<tab>Vorsaile Heuloix has a special assignment for you.
target: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_SEQ_00<tab>双蛇党のボルセル大牙佐はグランドカンパニー内の評価をあげる任務を与えたいようだ。

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_SEQ_01<tab>Dzemael Darkhold in the Coerthas central highlands has been overrun by voidsent, and you have been selected to lead the extermination mission. Travel to the Darkhold and receive a briefing from Ophelie, a knight of House Dzemael.
target: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_SEQ_01<tab>ボルセル大牙佐は新たな任務を紹介した。まずはクルザス中央高地にある「ゼーメル要塞」の「オフェリ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_SEQ_02Explore the depths of Dzemael Darkhold and purge the fortress of the voidsent menace.

※Dzemael Darkhold can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_SEQ_02ゼーメル要塞に巣食う妖異を討伐しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_SEQ_03<tab>Your mission is a success. Return to the Adders' Nest and report to Vorsaile Heuloix.
target: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_SEQ_03<tab>グリダニアの「双蛇党：統合司令部」の「ボルセル大牙佐」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_SEQ_04<tab>Your brave deeds at Dzemael Darkhold have raised the reputation of the Twin Adder in Ishgard, and earned you the admiration of your superiors.
target: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_SEQ_04<tab>ボルセル大牙佐と話すことができた。グランドカンパニー内の評価があがったようだ。

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ophelie at Dzemael Darkhold.
target: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_TODO_00<tab>クルザス中央高地のゼーメル要塞のオフェリと話す

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_TODO_02<tab>Report to Vorsaile Heuloix at the Adders' Nest.
target: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_TODO_02<tab>グリダニアの双蛇党：統合司令部のボルセル大牙佐と話す

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Doing the Twin Adder proud as ever, I hear.
target:
TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_000やあ、)) (( )) 02 /var>)) (()) /var>。
我らが双蛇党のため、励んでるみたいだね。

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_001<tab>You've arrived at a most opportune time. House Dzemael of Ishgard has requested our assistance with a matter of some import, and I've decided that you're just the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> for the task.
target:
TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_001そんな君の腕を見こんで、任せたい任務があるんだ。
……イシュガルドのゼーメル家からの協力要請なんだけど。

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_002<tab>Your mission, in brief: travel to Dzemael Darkhold and purge the subterranean fortress of voidsent.
target:
TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_002君に「ゼーメル要塞」とかいう場所に巣食う、
妖異退治に挑んできてほしいんだ。

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_003<tab>See to your preparations and make your way to the central highlands of Coerthas─once there, you should find the Darkhold without much difficulty. Ophelie, a knight in the service of House Dzemael, will meet you upon arrival and brief you in greater detail. I await word of your success.
target:
TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_003詳細は、クルザス中央高地の「ゼーメル要塞」にいる
ゼーメル家の騎士「オフェリ」から聞いてくれ。
それじゃあね、いい報せを期待してるよ。

source:
TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_OPHELIE_000_010Whaaaaaa, who goes there!?
...Oh, you must be the reinforcements. I beg your pardon. Recent sights have left me as skittish as an untrained chocobo.
target:
TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_OPHELIE_000_010双蛇党からの援軍でありますか！？
これはありがたいのです！！

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_OPHELIE_000_011<tab>Dzemael Darkhold. The name itself sends a shiver up the spine, does it not? The place has been infested by all manner of fearsome voidsent of late. Why, I've even heard word of statues come to life!
target:
TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_OPHELIE_000_011ここ「ゼーメル要塞」は、
様々な妖異に占拠されてしまっているのであります。
噂では、動く石像まで現れたといいますが……。

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_OPHELIE_000_012<tab>While we Ishgardians pride ourselves on seeing to our own defenses, the threat this time is simply too great. You'll see to those abominations, won't you?
target:
TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_OPHELIE_000_012討伐隊を率い「ゼーメル要塞」に巣食う妖異を
どうか仕留めてほしいのであります！

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_020<tab>Welcome back, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Word of your success has already reached us. I would guerdon you a measure of Serpent Seals in recognition of your loyal service.
target:
TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_020ああ、任務を達成してきたんだね。
ゼーメル家の騎士から、既に報告は受けているよ。
君の功績を称え、報酬として軍票を支給しよう。

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_021<tab>The House Dzemael knight spoke most highly of you─this will go far to improve the Order's reputation in Ishgard. Rest assured that your superiors will hear directly from me of your efforts.
target:
TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_021これで双蛇党は、イシュガルドに恩を売ることができた。
君の素晴らしい貢献ぶりについては、
僕から統合司令部に報告しておいたからね。

source: TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_022<tab>Should you continue to serve us as you have done, I suspect a promotion is in your future. Stay true to the wood's will, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, and be safe in your travels.
target:
TEXT_COMGRD010_01129_VORSAILE_000_022しかるべき時が来れば、さらなる昇級も叶うだろうさ。
それじゃ、森の意志あらんことを！
